data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: The button is always visible but has no functionality, just a visual bug.
data.expected_result: The prune members option should only be visible when you have the kick permission.
data.short_description: [Visual bug] Prune members option without necessary permissions visible
data.steps_to_repro: - Give any role the permission to open the server settings (for example manage channels) but don't give the permission to kick members - Assign this role to any user - With this user open the server settings - Go to members - Click on the 3 dots - Click on the option `Prune`
